updateH(maxTF, avgTF, stdTF, number_of_sentences, features=None)[source]¶

if features == None or “WRel” in features: self.PL = self.WDL / maxTF self.PR = self.WDR / maxTF self.WRel = ( (0.5 + (self.PWL * (self.tf / maxTF) + self.PL)) + (0.5 + (self.PWR * (self.tf / maxTF) + self.PR)) )
